cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)
project(ogdf-user-example CXX)

set(OGDF_CONFIG_SEARCH_PATH PATH ./build)
set(OGDF_DIR PATH ./ogdf)

find_package(OGDF CONFIG PATHS ${OGDF_CONFIG_SEARCH_PATH})


if(NOT OGDF_FOUND)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "No OGDF configuration for CMake has been found. "
    "Please set OGDF_CONFIG_SEARCH_PATH such that ogdf-config.cmake (generated by your OGDF build) can be found.")
endif()

include_directories(${OGDF_INCLUDE_DIRS} ./include ./src)
link_libraries(OGDF)

file(GLOB main_SRC
        "./include/*.h"
        "./src/*.cpp"
        )

add_executable(tsp main.cpp ${main_SRC})
target_include_directories(tsp PRIVATE ${OGDF_INCLUDE_DIRS} ./include ./src)
target_link_libraries(tsp OGDF)
